items.title: Servier India ends exclusive distribution pact with Entero amid monopoly concerns
items.description: The move comes after the All India Organisation of Chemists and Druggists (AIOCD) raised red flags about the deal, warning that such exclusivity could lead to market distortion, reduced competition, and medicine shortages.

items.title: Soft Start to June Series But Nifty Holds 24,700 | Bajaj Auto, Suzlon in Focus | Closing Bell Live
items.description: Nifty Kicks Off June Series On A Subdued Note. Nifty ends the week on a negative note. Broader markets outperform this week. Mid & smallcaps outperformance continues. Market Breadth skewed in favour of losers. India VIX cools further. All sectors barring PSU banks end in red. Metals, auto, IT among top sectoral laggards. FMCG, CPSE indices among weekly losers. PSU banks, Nifty Bank & Realty amid weekly gainers. Catch Nandita Khemka and Yatin Mota as they discuss stocks on their radar.

items.title: Sensex, Nifty start June series on a weak note as IT drags, tariff concerns weigh
items.description: Indian markets started the June series on a cautious note as global tariff tensions and GDP uncertainty offset gains from strong FPI inflows. IT stocks dragged, while PSU banks bucked the trend

items.title: Reliance Power shares jump 16%, hit 10-year high amid surge in trading volumes
items.description: Reliance Power share price: Over 51.5 crore shares were involved in active trade today. This marks a whopping 245% jump from the volumes seen by the stock just a day before, according to data on NSE.

items.title: April may be the best month for stocks, February the bleakest: Here’s why
items.description: An analysis by Axis Capital has shown that April has seen positive returns on 12 occasions in the last 15 years, the most compared to any other month. On the other hand, February has been the bleakest in terms of monthly returns.

items.title: SML Isuzu Q4 Net Profit at ₹52.95 Cr, Declares ₹18 Dividend; M&M to Acquire Stake
items.description: SML Isuzu Q4 Net Profit at ₹52.95 Cr, Declares ₹18 Dividend; M&M to Acquire Stake

items.title: Rane Holdings Declares ₹38 Dividend; FY25 Cons. PAT Soars to ₹207 Cr on Exceptional Gain
items.description: Rane Holdings Declares ₹38 Dividend; FY25 Cons. PAT Soars to ₹207 Cr on Exceptional Gain

items.title: Vodafone Idea shares fall 3% ahead of Q4 results, likely fundraising announcement
items.description: Vodafone Idea share price: Earlier this year, the telecom major had cautioned the government that it cannot operate beyond FY26 without its support and may have to go for insolvency.

items.title: Dr Reddy's targets new launches, potential M&A as gRevlimid tapers off in America
items.description: Dr Reddy's CFO Narasimham recently told to Moneycontrol he is confident of 'sustained double-digit sales growth' in FY26, with EBITDA and Return on Capital Employed (ROCE) at 25% or above. Some analysts are circumspect about the ability to fully offset the 'gRevlimid void' in the medium term.

items.title: Buy Minda Corporation; target of Rs 624: Deven Choksey
items.description: Deven Choksey is bullish on Minda Corporation has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 624 in its research report dated May 30, 2025.

items.title: Prestige Estates shares fall, snap 5-day winning streak on weak Q4 results
items.description: Prestige Estates Projects ended a five-day rally with a 1.5 percent drop on May 30, after Q4 results showed sharp year-on-year declines in revenue, profit, and sales volume

items.title: Bajaj Auto's EV production at risk from July as China tightens rare earth magnet supply
items.description: Bajaj Auto share price: Under the new protocol, Bajaj’s vendors must self-declare end-use, followed by approvals from Indian authorities and the Chinese Embassy in India.

items.title: Vedanta, Tata Steel, other metal stocks tumble up to 3% as US-China tariff talks 'a bit stalled'
items.description: US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on May 29 said that US-China tariff talks are a 'bit stalled' and a deal will be concluded possibly after the direct involvement of Donald Trump and Xi Jinping.

items.title: Ola Electric shares plunge 6% as Q4FY25 loss widens: Should you buy, sell or hold?
items.description: Ola Electric share price | The electric scooter-maker's revenue from operations meanwhile fell 62% YoY to Rs 611 crore in Q4FY25.

items.title: Wockhardt shares jump 7% as net loss narrows to Rs 45 crore in Q4FY25
items.description: Wockhardt slashed its quarterly net loss to Rs 45 crore, boosted by revenue growth and a return to operational profitability.

items.title: TCS, Infosys, HCL Tech, other IT stocks slide as US appeals court reinstates Trump tariffs
items.description: Indian IT stocks slipped up to 2 percent on May 30 after a US appeals court reinstated Trump-era tariffs, renewing concerns of reduced tech spending and heightened trade friction.
